data.message:
My account was blockaded,and I was wondering why is my account blocked?
After reviewing my situation,reactivated my account,please
I will very grateful you.

replies.message: Hey 張明傑, blocks are temporary and can last a few hours or a few days. Please sit tight while the ban is in place. You can read more about our policies here: http://on.fb.me/1TjmBDn. -Elisha

I'm sorry this happened to you...

What Elisha is not telling you is Facebook promotes censorship. So if you have something to say and Facebook don't like it they will socially punish you...

I'm sorry again. This has happened to me before. 
Elisha you should be ashamed of the answer given. Stop holding back people's individuality!
Wr appreciate your opinion God loves you and the world

Because I do not use real names to be audited is frozen so I want to know what time to lift the freeze 

Blockade refers to the hours, days will be more than 10 days it?
